title: What's wrong with Twitch?
body:
Why doesn't Twitch's expunge work on other allied poisons? Why doesn't Twitch's expunge replenish mana like Kalista's does? Why doesn't Twitch's expunge have a slow attached to it? Why is Twitch's poison cask so useless? Why isn't Twitch's ultimate on a shorter cooldown/last longer?

Why is Twitch so bad?
